languages.text: "Надеюсь, мы еще встретимся — я всегда рад{mf||а} приветствовать истинного слугу Императора на борту".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, мы еще встретимся — я всегда рад{mf||а} приветствовать истинного слугу Императора на борту".

languages.text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, мы еще встретимся — я всегда рад{mf||а} приветствовать истинного слугу Императора на борту".

traits.locale_text: "I hope we meet again. I am always happy to welcome a true servant of the Emperor aboard my ship."
"I hope we meet again. I am always happy to welcome a true servant of the Emperor aboard my ship."
"I hope we meet again. I am always happy to welcome a true servant of the Emperor aboard my ship."
"I hope we meet again. I am always happy to welcome a true servant of the Emperor aboard my ship."
"I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."
"I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

languages.text: « J'espère que nous nous reverrons. Les véritables serviteurs de l'Empereur sont toujours les bienvenus à bord de mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que nous nous reverrons. Je me réjouis toujours d'accueillir un véritable serviteur de l'empereur à bord de mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: “希望我们能再次见面，我的船永远欢迎帝皇真正的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

traits.locale_text: “希望我们能再次见面，我永远欢迎帝皇真正的仆人登上我的船。”

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, wir begegnen uns wieder. Wahre Diener des Imperators sind an Bord meines Schiffs immer willkommen."
languages.original_text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, wir begegnen uns wieder. Ich freue mich immer, einen wahren Diener des Imperators an Bord meines Schiffs begrüßen zu können."

languages.text: «Espero que nos volvamos a ver. Siempre es un placer recibir a los verdaderos sirvientes del Emperador a bordo de mi nave».
languages.original_text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que nos volvamos a ver. Siempre es un placer recibir a un leal sirviente del Emperador a bordo de mi nave».

languages.text: 「また会えることを願う。皇帝の真の従者なら、いつでも我が船に歓迎だよ」
languages.original_text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「また会えることを願う。皇帝の真の従者なら、我が船にいつでも喜んで迎えるよ」

languages.text: "Umarım tekrar karşılaşırız. İmparator'un gerçek hizmetkârlarına gemimde her daim yer vardır."
languages.original_text: "I hope we meet again. True servants of the Emperor are always welcome aboard my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım tekrar karşılaşırız. İmparator'un gerçek hizmetkârlarının gemimde her zaman yeri vardır."
